author: cnbc.com
title: Atara Biotherapeutics reports 4Q loss
text:
SOUTH SAN FRANCISCO, Calif. (AP) _ Atara Biotherapeutics Inc. (ATRA) on Tuesday reported a loss of $35.3 million in its fourth quarter.
On a per-share basis, the South San Francisco, California-based company said it had a loss of $1.15.
For the year, the company reported that its loss widened to $119.5 million, or $4 per share.
Atara Biotherapeutics shares have more than doubled since the beginning of the year. The stock has nearly tripled in the last 12 months.
